name: Root Beer River
description:
You are a beaver with your own root beer float stand on the Root Beer River... And there are a lot of thirsty beavers looking for floats!

So grab a mug (or a stack of mugs), fill them with root beer and then scoop in some ice cream, and get ready to serve some floats!

Controls:
Left or Right arrow: move left or right
Down arrow: pick up mug, scoop ice cream, or serve customer
Up arrow: switch between the counter and the kitchen
Stand under the root beer stream with a mug to fill the mug
